content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return a pseudo random number in a range between 0 and 1:
<?php
echo lcg_value();
?>

Definition and Usage
The lcg_value() function returns a pseudo random number in a range between 0 and 1.
Syntax
lcg_value();
Technical Details
Return Value:
A pseudo random float value in a range between 0 and 1
Return Type:
Float
PHP Version:
4+

★
+1
